mapper.insert: insert into cafe_map_review(cafe_id, user_id, review_date, star_rating, content, like_number) value (#{cafe_id}, #{user_id}, #{review_date}, #{star_rating}, #{content}, #{like_number})
mapper.select: select exists (select * from cafe_map_review where review_id = #{review_id} and cafe_id = #{cafe_id} and user_id = #{user_id}) as success
mapper.update: update cafe_map_review set star_rating = #{star_rating}, content = #{content} where review_id = #{review_id}
